name: HashDB Plugin
description: Plugin for interacting with the OALABS HashDB service.
longdescription: Plugin that can be used to lookup hashes for a wide variety of obfuscation functions that dynamically load functions by verifying hash information. This plugin is a derivative work of the [IDA Plugin](https://github.com/OALabs/hashdb-ida/) from [OALabs](https://oalabs.openanalysis.net/) for connecting to their [HashDB service](https://hashdb.openanalysis.net/).
